subject_terms_3: Watercolour painting Visual arts Clifford Pier
physical_appearance: "The image shows a painting. It is rectangular in shape. The painting depicts a figure sitting on a bench. The figure seems to be male and is reading, with his bags to his side. His shoes are to his side and his red socks are visible. The outlines of boats can be seen at the background of the painting, beyond the railing. The signature and year, ""Tan. 1964"" is stated at the bottom right hand side. There is a vertical line of Chinese characters
creator_1: Tan, Choon Ghee, 1930- Tan, Choon Ghee
subject_terms_1: from the extreme top left hand side. " figures (representation)
